title: YMDUCH Women's Long Sleeve Mock Turtle Neck Bodycon Mini Tank Short Party Dress
description: The sexy and fashionable long sleeved wrap dress is made of high-quality polyester and spandex fabric. The fabric is soft and elastic, with a comfortable feel.
Features: Flare long sleeves, mini length, mock turtle neck, bodycon, decorative pockets on both sides, enriching the style of the clothes, and a zipper design on the back for easy on and off.
Suitable occasions: Suitable for daily casual wear, dating, shopping, parties, clubs, birthday parties, etc. Suitable for spring, autumn, and winter wear.
Easy to match:This basic dress can be paired with black stilettos, low heels, boots, flats, and mini handbags. And matching jackets for spring, summer, autumn, and winter.
